title: StateTransition
description: A directed edge in the ExperienceState machine, owned by its source ExperienceState. Specifies the trigger event, destination state, optional guard condition, and side-effect actions. The 'from' state is implicitly the ExperienceState that contains this transition via relationship.

to.description: SpecNodeId of the destination ExperienceState this transition leads to (e.g., 'ux.experiencestate.order-confirmed').

trigger.description: DOM or UX event that initiates this state transition, per HTML 5.3 event model.

actions.description: List of StateAction specNodeIds to execute when this transition fires, in order.

guard.description: Optional boolean guard condition that must evaluate to true for this transition to fire.

expression.description: Boolean expression string evaluated against current state context.

syntax.description: Expression language used to evaluate the guard expression. 'javascript': JS boolean expression (e.g., 'user.isLoggedIn && cart.items.length > 0'); 'jsonpath': JSONPath predicate (e.g., '$.user.role == "admin"'); 'cel': Common Expression Language (e.g., 'user.age >= 18'); 'jsonata': JSONata expression (e.g., '$count(items) > 0').
